title: Executive Order 7621-Power Site Restoration No. 485. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of March 31, 1911, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 178
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive Order of March 31, 1911, withdrawing lands for Power Site Reserve No. 178, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 5 S., R. 3 E.,      Sec. 26, lot 2, SW¼NE¼, SE¼NW¼, and NE¼SW¼;      Sec. 33, lots (SE¼SW¼).
T. 6 S., R. 8 E.,      Sec. 4, lots 3 and 4;      Sec. 5, lots 3 and 4;      Sec. 6, lots 4 and 5.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7621-Power Site Restoration No. 485. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of March 31, 1911, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 178 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368975
